channel.title: lnkzip - Free URL Shortener
channel.description: Free URL shortener API with no sign up required. Create custom short URLs with tracking, generate QR codes, and get analytics.

item.title: Welcome to lnkzip - Free URL Shortener
item.description: Discover the ultimate free URL shortener with custom names, QR code generation, and powerful analytics. No sign up required.

item.title: Custom URL Shortener Features
item.description: Learn about our custom URL shortener features including link to QR code generation, click tracking, and real-time analytics.
